name: NO BRAND's First Shirt
description: Here’s what I think the truth is: We are all addicts of fossil fuels in a state of denial, about to face cold turkey. And like so many addicts about to face cold turkey, our leaders are now committing violent crimes to get what little is left of what we’re hooked on. -Kurt Vonnegut Printed on 100% Organic American Apparel Tees. We support American Apparel, an environmentally conscience and ethical company. 50% of all proceeds from this shirt will be donated to the Union of Concerned Scientists
